title: Reflective Practice in Higher Education: Professional Development Through Mentoring and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Educational Experience
context.additional_context: Short modular learning progression in a smartphone-based mobile environment, with reflective practice competencies strengthened through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze their teaching methods and derive improvement strategies through reflective practice.
Learners can revise and enhance educational strategies by utilizing peer feedback in mentoring and collaborative learning environments.
Learners can incorporate the integration of technological, pedagogical, and content knowledge (TPACK) into science education design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
